author: Manuja Veerappa
title: Bodyweight workouts replace hockey training
description: The scheduled breaks for the Indian men and women's hockey teams were put on hold after it was deemed unsafe for them to travel to their home towns in the aftermath of the Covid-19 outbreak. In fact, on March 10, a lockdown order was issued at SAI.
content:
BENGALURU: Two weeks before the March 24 lockdown, the Indian men and women's hockey teams' movement was restricted to the 81-acre Sports Authority of India campus here.
During that period, training kept them busy. But, for a week now they don't have that lu… [+2653 chars]
